message: Let's split this evenly, Bob. It's a fair start!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation.  Let's compromise.
You're running out of time, the inflation is eating away your share. I'm willing to take a bigger cut.
Okay, Bob. I see you're playing hardball.  Let's split it this way, and I'll consider it a lesson learned about inflation!
